Parole for mum who used 5-year-old as ‘sexual plaything’ - victim told just three days before release https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parole-for-mum-who-used-5-year-old-as- Sex-plaything-victim-told-just-third-days-before-release/ CEGJZYWX4JDVJMJPS5LZQZYMRI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/parole-for-mum-who-used-5-year-old-as- Sex-plaything-victim-told-just-third-days-before-release/ CEGJZYWX4JDVJMJPS5LZQZYMRI/ Anna LeaskThe woman will be released having served three years and 11 months behind bars. Mon, 24 Jun 2024 03:20:12 +0000 A woman jailed for sexually abusing her 5-year-old daughter has been released on parole. Her young victim was not told until three days before the woman left prison.
